text:
William Osborne "Tuck" Tucker III (August 20, 1961 – December 22, 2020) was an American writer, artist, animator, songwriter, and director. He was born in Lynchburg, Virginia. He was known for having worked on "SpongeBob SquarePants", "The Simpsons" and "Hey Arnold!".
Tucker died in California on December 22, 2020 at the age of 59.
